attributes.action: Force Banks to allow more time to pay money into account(s), up to 11.59pm daily
attributes.background:
Banks currently only allow up till 3.30pm to pay money into an account, before charging customers, or not paying items.
Customers should have till 11.59pm the same day, to pay money into their accounts, and count towards their balance, before they are charged

rejection.details: This would be a decision for banks and not the UK Government or Parliament.
